title: FIN7 Deploys Anubis Backdoor to Hijack Windows Systems via Compromised SharePoint Sites
description: The financially motivated threat actor known as FIN7 has been linked to a Python-based backdoor called Anubis (not to be confused with an Android banking trojan of the same name) that can grant them remote access to compromised Windows systems. "This malware allows attackers to execute remote shell commands and other system operations, giving them full control over an infected machine," Swiss
